1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Definition of relmap operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Define
6  ( RopDefine,
7    ropList, rops, rop,
8    ropAlias,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture   as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax     as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core       as C
14
15-- | Constructor, usage, and attribute sorter
16{-# WARNING RopDefine "This is only used in defined module." #-}
17type RopDefine c = (C.RopCons c, S.AttrLayout)
18
19-- | Make implementations of relmap operators.
20ropList
21    :: C.RopGroup     -- ^ Operator group
22    -> [RopDefine c]  -- ^ Operator definitions
23    -> [C.Rop c]      -- ^ Relmap operators
24ropList group = map make where
25    make (cons, layout) =
26        let usage  = S.attrUsageString layout
27            name   = head $ words usage
28            sorter = S.attrParaBy layout
29        in C.Rop { C.ropName   = name
30                 , C.ropGroup  = group
31                 , C.ropAttr   = layout
32                 , C.ropParaze = sorter
33                 , C.ropCons   = cons }
34
35-- | Make implementations of relmap operators.
36rops :: (S.ToAttrLayout lay) => C.RopGroup -> [(C.RopCons c, lay)] -> [C.Rop c]
37rops group def = ropList group (S.toAttrLayout O.<$$> def)
38
39-- | Make definition of relmap operator.
40rop :: C.RopCons c              -- ^ Constructor
41    -> [(S.AttrUsage, String)]  -- ^ Usage text and attribute layout
42    -> RopDefine c              -- ^ Operator definition
43rop cons ul = (cons, S.toAttrLayout ul)
44
45-- | Add aliases of relmap operator.
46ropAlias
47    :: [(C.RopName, C.RopName)]  -- ^ Alias and original rop names
48    -> O.Map [C.Rop c]           -- ^ Original rop list to add aliases.
49ropAlias alias rs = foldr ropAliasAdd rs alias
50
51-- | Add alias of relmap operator.
52ropAliasAdd :: (C.RopName, C.RopName) -> O.Map [C.Rop c]
53ropAliasAdd (name, orig) = loop where
54    loop [] = []
55    loop (r : rs) | C.ropName r == orig  = r { C.ropName = name } : r : rs
56                  | otherwise            = r : loop rs
57
